text: man-il hananim-i haeham-eulo geudaeleul manjisindamyeon geubun oeeneun geu geos-eul geodueo jusil bun-i amudo eobs eumyeo geubun-i geudaega chugbogbadgileul wonhasindamyeon geubun-ui eunhyeleul mag-eul jaga eobs-euni geubun-ui tteus-i issneun jong ege eunhyeleul bepusinila geubun-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabiga chungmanhasinila
